filmography.title: The Outlaw
filmography.role_description: The sultry love interest of Billy the Kid and Doc Holliday; the controversial role that launched her career and battled censorship.
filmography.plot: Billy the Kid and Doc Holliday fight over a horse and a woman while trying to evade Sheriff Pat Garrett.

filmography.title: Young Widow
filmography.role_description: A young war widow who struggles to move on with her life until she meets a dashing pilot.
filmography.plot: A journalist returns from the war and falls in love with a woman who is grieving the loss of her husband.

filmography.title: The Paleface
filmography.role_description: A tough, sharp-shooting frontierswoman who marries a cowardly dentist (Bob Hope) as a cover for her secret mission.
filmography.plot: Calamity Jane marries a cowardly dentist as a cover while she hunts for gunrunners, making him look like a hero.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song ('Buttons and Bows')

filmography.title: His Kind of Woman
filmography.role_description: A singer posing as a wealthy heiress who gets caught up in a deadly game involving a deported gangster at a Mexican resort.
filmography.plot: A deported gangster plans to re-enter the USA by assuming the identity of a gambler, trapping a singer and a mystery man in the middle.

filmography.title: Double Dynamite
filmography.role_description: A bank teller whose fiancé saves a gangster's life, leading to a misunderstanding about a bank robbery.
filmography.plot: A bank teller saves a gangster's life and is given a large sum of money, but he can't spend it because he's suspected of bank robbery.
filmography.awards: Co-starring Frank Sinatra and Groucho Marx

filmography.title: The Las Vegas Story
filmography.role_description: A former singer who returns to Las Vegas with her new husband, only to become a suspect in a murder investigation.
filmography.plot: A woman returns to Las Vegas with her investment banker husband, rekindling a romance with an old flame who investigates a murder.

filmography.title: Macao
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer stranded in Macao who helps an American adventurer expose a crime lord.
filmography.plot: Three strangers arrive in the port of Macao, including a singer, a drifter, and a detective, all with secrets.

filmography.title: Son of Paleface
filmography.role_description: A beautiful bandit leader who deceives the bumbling son of Paleface Potter while being pursued by a government agent.
filmography.plot: Junior Potter returns to the West to find his father's fortune, but instead finds trouble with outlaws and the government.

filmography.title: Montana Belle
filmography.role_description: The notorious outlaw Belle Starr, who becomes involved with the Dalton Gang while trying to go straight.
filmography.plot: Belle Starr meets the Dalton Gang and Bob Dalton falls for her, complicating her plans to retire from crime.

filmography.title: Road to Bali
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself in a dream sequence, playfully referencing her role in 'The Outlaw'.
filmography.plot: Two song-and-dance men leave Australia for Bali to work as divers and find themselves competing for a princess's affection.

filmography.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
filmography.role_description: A witty, grounded showgirl who protects her diamond-loving best friend while seeking romance on a cruise to Paris.
filmography.plot: Two showgirls travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the wealthy father of one of the girls' fiancés.

filmography.title: The French Line
filmography.role_description: A wealthy Texas oil heiress who travels to Paris undercover to find a man who will love her for herself, not her money.
filmography.plot: A rich girl travels to Paris on a luxury liner, posing as a model to find true love.

filmography.title: Underwater!
filmography.role_description: The wife of a treasure hunter who joins an expedition to find sunken gold in the Caribbean.
filmography.plot: Two divers and a woman search for sunken treasure in the Caribbean, facing sharks and rival treasure hunters.

filmography.title: Foxfire
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who marries a mining engineer with Apache heritage, facing prejudice and cultural clashes.
filmography.plot: A New York socialite marries a mining engineer in Arizona, but their marriage is tested by his obsession with finding gold.

filmography.title: The Tall Men
filmography.role_description: A woman rescued from an Indian attack who joins a cattle drive and becomes torn between two men.
filmography.plot: Two brothers head to Montana to find fortune and romance on a cattle drive, facing harsh weather and jayhawkers.

filmography.title: Gentlemen Marry Brunettes
filmography.role_description: A dual role as a showgirl and her mother in this musical follow-up to 'Gentlemen Prefer Blondes' set in Paris.
filmography.plot: Two sisters travel to Paris to perform and find love, following in the footsteps of their mother and aunt.

filmography.title: Hot Blood
filmography.role_description: A spirited woman who enters into an arranged marriage with a reluctant gypsy king.
filmography.plot: A gypsy king tries to avoid an arranged marriage, but his brother has other plans.

filmography.title: The Revolt of Mamie Stover
filmography.role_description: A woman with a checkered past who moves to Hawaii during WWII and becomes a wealthy property owner.
filmography.plot: A woman forced to leave San Francisco moves to Honolulu and builds a fortune during the war, but loses the man she loves.

filmography.title: The Fuzzy Pink Nightgown
filmography.role_description: A movie star who is kidnapped as a publicity stunt for her new film, but ends up falling for one of her captors.
filmography.plot: A movie star is kidnapped by two men on the eve of her new film's premiere, leading to a romantic complication.

filmography.title: Fate Is the Hunter
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself performing for troops in a USO flashback sequence.
filmography.plot: An airline investigator tries to uncover the true cause of a fatal plane crash, suspecting pilot error.

filmography.title: Johnny Reno
filmography.role_description: A saloon owner caught in the middle of a town conflict when a U.S. Marshal arrives to arrest an outlaw.
filmography.plot: A U.S. Marshal saves a man from a lynch mob and brings him to a town where the citizens want him dead.

filmography.title: Waco
filmography.role_description: A woman who married a wealthy man for security after her true love, a gunslinger, went to prison.
filmography.plot: A gunfighter is pardoned from prison to clean up a lawless town, where he finds his former lover is now married.

filmography.title: The Born Losers
filmography.role_description: The mother of a girl victimized by a biker gang in this action film that introduced the character Billy Jack.
filmography.plot: A half-Indian Green Beret veteran takes on a motorcycle gang terrorizing a California seaside town.

filmography.title: Darker Than Amber
filmography.role_description: A memorable supporting role as a violent woman who engages in a brutal fight in this Travis McGee mystery; Russell's final film role.
filmography.plot: Travis McGee rescues a woman from drowning and gets pulled into a drug smuggling ring investigation.

filmography.title: Hollywood Canteen
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself, one of many stars entertaining troops in this WWII morale booster.
filmography.plot: A soldier on leave in Hollywood meets his dream girl at the Hollywood Canteen, a club for servicemen staffed by movie stars.
